caption.p: Workflow schematic of the analyses for one species and one IHA metric. The predictive relationship (c) was set up by calculating each IHA metric for each sample (b) using the 12‐month time‐series gauge data before the date of biological sampling (a). Each IHA metric (e) was then calculated for each year during baseline ( BL, 1998 ‐ 2017, d), horizon 2050 (H2050, 2046 ‐ 2065, d), and horizon 2090 (H2090, 2080 ‐ 2099, d) and then used to predict projected abundance values ( AV, f) for each species in each year during each period. The 20 AV per species were averaged to calculate the mean abundance value ( MAV, g) for each species in each period
